section.title: Course Description
section.p: Taken from the official PCC course description:

Includes infinite sequences and series (including Taylor series), vectors, and geometry of space. Graphing calculator required. TI-89 Titanium or Casio Classpad 330 recommended. Prerequisites: MTH 252 and (WR 115 and RD 115) or IRW 115 or equivalent placement. Audit available.
The complete Course Content and Outcome Guide can be found at www.pcc.edu/ccog/.
